title: Local Quality
text:
Consider the utility of each feature. 

Different parts of the object may perform different functions.

title: Asymmetry
text:
Make the design asymmetrical.

Would asymmetry improve ergonomics?
Would asymmetry improve stability?

title: Merging
text:

title: Universality

title: Preliminary Anti-actions
text:
Mitigate failure sources before they occur.

Maintaining surplus inventory.

title: Preliminary Actions
text:
Perform a function before the output is required.

Preset document templates.
Proximity detecting automated doors.
Providing hand tools with flat pack furniture.
